forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow. Cloudy. Low around 12, with temperatures rising to around 17 overnight. Southwest wind around 9 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow. Cloudy. High near 32, with temperatures falling to around 30 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible.

forecast.name: Thursday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Snow then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow before 7pm. Mostly cloudy. Low around 22, with temperatures rising to around 24 overnight. West wind 5 to 9 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 34. South southwest wind 5 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible
forecast.shortForecast: Snow Showers And Patchy Blowing Snow
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow showers and patchy blowing snow. Cloudy. Low around 22, with temperatures rising to around 28 overnight. West wind around 15 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible
forecast.shortForecast: Snow Showers And Patchy Blowing Snow
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow showers and patchy blowing snow. Mostly cloudy. High near 33, with temperatures falling to around 31 in the afternoon. Northwest wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible.

forecast.name: Thursday Night
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered snow showers before 1am. Mostly cloudy. Low around 25, with temperatures rising to around 27 overnight. West wind 5 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers after 1pm. Cloudy, with a high near 38. Southwest wind 10 to 25 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

Nubs Nob.conditions: Best conditions of the year on the upper Red and Blue loops ! Thank you Mother Nature , Nubs Nob , and John Baker . It was like skiing on butter .

Shelby Township.conditions: They've finally got enough accumulation to make the golf course skiable. Used waxless rock skis and had a very nice time. Skied some in the woods, flats are doable but wouldn't try any hills, not enough snow yet.

Huron Meadows Metropark.conditions: Snow was added today.  Trail in excellent condition from the building and back for skating or classic.  Break the glass and get your good skis out BIll.  Should be good the rest of this week and next with the cold temperatures.Snow gun was running with a big pile made. Thanks everyone at Huron Meadows for keeping us going.

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails were power-tilled with a track set yesterday. We plan to pack them today.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM
nubsNob.comments: The natural snow from the past few days has been tilled into the base and the snow surface is excellent. There is another inch of light snow on top of the corduroy this morning. The lifts will spin from 9:00 AM to 9:00 PM today with an hour break beginning at 4:30 to prepare for the night session. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
